member.name: M:Korzh.DbUtils.MySql.MySqlBridge.TurnOffAutoIncrement
member.summary: Sends an SQL command which turns off the possibility to set values for IDENTITY (auto-increment) columns for the current table. Must be implemented in derived classes.

member.name: M:Korzh.DbUtils.MySql.MySqlBridge.TurnOnAutoIncrement
member.summary: Sends an SQL command which turns on the possibility to set values for IDENTITY (auto-increment) columns for the current table. Must be implemented in derived classes.

member.name: M:Korzh.DbUtils.MySql.MySqlBridge.TurnOffConstraints
member.summary: Sends an SQL command which turns off the constraints for the current table. Must be implemented in derived classes.

member.name: M:Korzh.DbUtils.MySql.MySqlBridge.TurnOnConstraints
member.summary: Sends an SQL command which turns the constraints on for the current table. Must be implemented in derived classes.
